https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/arJF829RP9cYvh0NU70dC5TtXSa.jpg A newly-developed microchip designed by Zorin Industries for the British Government that can survive the electromagnetic radiation caused by a nuclear explosion has landed in the hands of the KGB. James Bond must find out how and why. His suspicions soon lead him to big industry leader Max Zorin. A View to a Kill
